identity.mission: Create a 'Pro Studio' Social Media Automation Dashboard that feels like a hacker's command center, not a generic SaaS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Finance precision with Streetwear aesthetics.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'Powerful' and 'Fast'.
Content is King: The user's content (carousels) must pop against the dark UI.
Contrast: High contrast neon against deep black.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H4. Tight tracking (-0.02em).
headings.anti_pattern: Do NOT use Inter for headings.

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, and data tables.

mono.usage: Use for code snippets, API keys, and data values.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous (2x standard). Use p-6, p-8, p-12.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense, data-heavy. Use col-span-2 for main charts.

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetrical. Hero takes 8 cols. Supporting takes 4.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide

inputs.style: bg-secondary border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm h-12

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, w-64, border-r border-border bg-background
navigation.header: Sticky top, glassmorphism (bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md), border-b border-border

visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle noise overlay to the background to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active states or pricing cards.

images.description: Dark mode workspace with monitor, good for hero section background or feature showcase.
Overhead view of conference room, good for 'About Us' or 'Team' section.
Clean desk setup with light, good for 'Productivity' context.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature highlights.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text unless it's a very specific brand moment.
Do NOT center-align everything. Use asymmetry.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505 or #0a0a0a.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Social Media Automation Dashboard. Focus on the 'Editor' experience. It should feel like a professional design tool (like Figma or Photoshop) but simplified. Use the 'Electric & Neon' theme to make it feel high-energy and productive. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the analytics dashboard.
